messages.subject: Keisuke Otori + Nagakura Shinpachi + Saitou Hajime
messages.msgSnippet: I am posting this message here rather than at http://www.shinsengumimb.com because it is a {very} obscure detail I found at http://8614.teacup.com/hijikata/bbs
messages.messageBody:
I am posting this message here rather than at
http://www.shinsengumimb.com because it is a {very} obscure detail I
found at http://8614.teacup.com/hijikata/bbs

on Monday Sept 6 someone posted (translation from
http://www.nifty.com/globalgate)

The lecture meeting about Keisuke Otori held in Kasuga (there are
Shinpachi Nagakura & Saito's 1 remains of a dwelling, and it is a
fortunate town smile) has been audited today. A lecturer is Mr. Tatsu
Fukumoto who is the posterity of Mr. Otori's brother. Precious data,
such as Mr. Otori's letter (actual thing), are brought, and I was
allowed to see them close at hand. About Mr. Otori, only vague career
(bony portion) which has appeared in the person file was known until
now. I carry out [ mind as meat was attached luckily this time ].
Although it was mainly the contents after Meiji, it is a too
attractive person. It is devoted to one thing and respects in "person
who excelled in learning" ÁÄ HONTO. Lecturer reason "Otori is a
scientist and is not a military man's type" -- I also felt so.
In addition, height is as short in stature as 150cm. However, DEKA ³
of the part courage is that it was considerable. It was a lecture
meeting very significant and precious when considering the thing of è
'C war, the thing in Goryoukaku, etc.
